name: HellHorn
description: A fearsome horned demon that guards the gates of Hell Castle with its burning fury and demonic strength.

abilities.name: Tackle
abilities.description: Deals 500 + (100% Physical Damage) to the target and has 50% chance to stun it for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Stomp
abilities.description: Stomps the ground, dealing 220% Physical Damage to all enemies and has 50% chance to stun each.

passive.name: Unstoppable
passive.description: HellHorn cannot be stunned. Any stun effects applied to it are immediately negated.
